column1: Hump behind the shoulders is an area of fat accumulation on the back of the neck.
The doctor must consider this along with other symptoms and test results.

Cause of dorsocervical fat pad includes any of the following: - Certain medicines used to treat HIV or AIDS - Long-term use of certain glucocorticoid medicines, including prednisone, cortisone, and hydrocortisone - Obesity - Hypercortisolism (caused by Cushing syndrome) - Certain genetic disorders that cause unusual fat accumulation Osteoporosis may cause a curvature of the spine in the neck called kyphoscoliosis.
This causes an abnormal shape but does not by itself cause excessive fat in the back of the neck.
Your doctor will perform a physical examination and ask about your medical history and symptoms.
